thread.title: Americans renouncing their citizenship reaches record high | Daily Mail Online
thread.title_full: Americans renouncing their citizenship reaches record high | Daily Mail Online

author: Kaileen Gaul For Dailymail.Com
title: Americans renouncing their citizenship reaches record high | Daily Mail Online
text: Americans renouncing their citizenship reaches a record high with a 50 percent jump in the last three months of 2016 amid Trump's election Between October and December 2016, 2,300 people renounced their US citizenship This is 50 percent more people than the same period in 2015 - Trump was elected president in November 2016 For the entire year 5,400 reported to the IRS they were giving up their citizen status Britain's Foreign Secretary Boris Johnson abandoned his US citizenship in 2016 citing tax purposes Published: 14:50 GMT, 10 February 2017 | Updated: 18:43 GMT, 10 February 2017 249 shares
